description.en_us:
## Update Notes:
- Updated [Game Installation]: Display compatibility warning when installing OptiFine and Forge simultaneously
---
- Adjusted [Forge]: Use the old installation method
- Adjusted [Game Installation]: Allow the use of invalid version names
- Adjusted [Version Management]: Rename without blocking invalid version names
- Adjusted [Application Interface]: Adjust UI
---
- Fixed [Path Management]: Some logical errors
- Fixed [Launch]: Path errors

## 1.3.7.3
- Updated [Settings]: Added default version isolation setting
---
- Adjusted [Forge]: Old installers use the previous installation method
- Adjusted [Animation]: Tweaked the pop-up zoom animation effect
- Adjusted [Language]: Refined description for "Error Version"
- Adjusted [Permissions]: Implemented stricter storage permission restrictions
---
- Fixed [Context]: Correcting misuse of repair

## 1.3.7.2:
- Fixed [Control Layout]: Unable to load properly

## 1.3.7.1:
- Fixed [Version Management]: Resolved version saving issue
- Fixed [Startup]: Addressed some issues

## 1.3.7:
- **Updated [Version Management]: Replaced instance system with version management, enabled version isolation**
- Updated [jre_launcher]: Displayed fatal signal on crash screen
- Updated [Turnip]: Updated Turnip driver
---
- Adjusted [Renderer]: Adjusted GL4ES renderer name
- Adjusted [Language]: Added reminder for users who haven't purchased Minecraft
---
- Fixed [Language]: "More" issue
- Fixed [Account]: Resolved issue where account data was cleared when switching Activity
description.zh_cn:
## 更新内容：
- 更新[安装游戏]: 同时安装 OptiFine 与 Forge 时，弹出兼容性警告
---
- 调整[Forge]: 使用旧的方式安装
- 调整[安装游戏]: 允许使用无效版本的名称
- 调整[版本管理]: 重命名不拦截无效版本的名称
- 调整应用界面]: 调整 UI
---
- 修复[路径管理]: 一些逻辑错误
- 修复[启动]: 路径错误

## 1.3.7.3
- 更新[设置]: 添加默认版本隔离设置
---
- 调整[Forge]: 旧的安装器使用旧的安装方式
- 调整[动画]: 调整弹出放大的动画效果
- 调整[语言]: “错误版本”的描述
- 调整[权限]: 更加严格的存储权限限制
---
- 修复[Context]: 修复错误的使用

## 1.3.7.2：
- 修复[控制布局]: 无法正常加载

## 1.3.7.1：
- 修复[版本管理]: 版本保存的异常
- 修复[启动]: 一些问题

## 1.3.7：
- **更新[版本管理]: 使用版本管理代替实例系统，启用版本隔离**
- 更新[jre_launcher]: 在崩溃界面展示致命信号
- 更新[Turnip]: 更新 Turnip 驱动
---
- 调整[渲染器]: 调整 GL4ES 渲染器名称
- 调整[语言]: 未购买 Minecraft 的提醒
---
- 修复[语言]: “更多”
- 修复[账号]: 切换 Activity 导致账号数据被清空
